```r
# Calculate silhouette width for many k using 
sil_width <- c(NA)
for(i in 2:10){
 fanny_fit <- fanny(gower_dist,
                 diss = TRUE,
                 k = i)
  sil_width[i] <- fanny_fit$silinfo$avg.width
}
```
